name: My Method
slogan: The No.1 provider of Pilates & yoga ‘delivered to your door’
description:
Our highly personalised service ensures that clients are given the dedicated time and encouragement needed to master their practise. We create a unique programme, tailored to their lifestyle and goals. They choose a time and place for their one to one or small group class - and their teacher comes to them.

Our matching process enables clients to be matched with a teacher that suits their needs and availability, whether it be someone looking to improve their fitness, strength, rehabilitate following an injury, or practice yoga or pilates during or after pregnancy. The scheduling process gives complete flexibility to teachers and clients.

jobs.title: Customer Success Specialist
jobs.description:
My Method has established itself as the No.1 specialist provider of Pilates & yoga ‘delivered to your door’. MM is a trusted authority for customers and teachers, setting the bar for teaching standards and consolidating segments of the fast growing, but highly fragmented wellness market.

We are looking for someone to join our customer success team as we continue to grow and scale our service. We are looking for a high-energy, driven individual who is completely at ease on the phone and confident building relationships with clients in a fast-paced environment.

The person coming into this role must be systems, process and growth oriented with an obsession for delivering excellent customer experience and customer discovery.

It is essential for the person in this role to have experience in the Pilates/Yoga/Wellness industry and a proven track record in hitting KPIs/sales targets.

This is an excellent opportunity for someone who wants to progress their career within a fast paced start-up.

**About the Customer Success Specialist role:**

A key member of the team of approx 3- 5 people in our lovely, bright E1 Shoreditch office. Responsible for building relationships with clients and teachers and maximising conversions in the customer journey.

As well as matching new clients to teachers, the team prides itself on developing positive and supportive relationships with existing customers. We are a two-sided platform, with two customers – teachers and clients. We maintain continuous feedback with both parties, to make sure they have the best experience. This is how we really add value to the teacher/client relationship.

The focus of the CS team is to match new clients to the best teacher for their needs, support both teachers and clients throughout their sessions together and ensure client progress and retention.

* Driving conversions and retention
* Communicating and training teachers on new systems and processes
* Building strong rapport with teachers and clients
* Delivering support, expertise, and guidance to clients and teachers

**Experience needed:**

* Proven track record for hitting targets and delivering outstanding customer experience
* Yoga/ Pilates/Wellness industry experience
* 2 years experience in previous B2C customer service role, preferably in a start-up

**Attributes**

* Highly motivated, over achiever, team player, facilitator
* Highly organised and time efficient
* Proven ability to prioritise tasks in-line with change
* Entrepreneurial spirit/mindset, flexibility toward dynamic change
* Direct, honest communication style
* A solid understanding of what makes excellent customer service
* Natural problem solver
* Attention to detail
* Ability to master new systems and processes quickly
* Propensity to succeed both personally and professionally
* Focused on achieving results and exceeding goals and objectives
* Must have a positive "can do, whatever it takes to get the job done" attitude
* Confident, high energy, outgoing and agile.

**MM PERKS**

* We get to the point and focus on results– no corporate fluff.
* Discounted rates on Pilates & Yoga sessions in your home.
* B Corporation – giving percentage of profit to charities for neurological and lifestyle related diseases.
* Bonus & share option scheme

Please include a cover letter with your reasons for applying for the position along with your CV. Anyone who fails to provide a cover letter will not be considered for the role.

Salary is £22-26k, 28 days, bonus etc

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: £22,000.00 to £26,000.00 /year
